name: Park Avenue Equity Partner
overview:
Park Avenue Equity Partners is a leading middle market private equity group headquartered in New York. The Firm makes equity and equity-linked investments in companies with opportunities for growth, established profitability and excellent management teams. Park Avenue Equityâ€™s focus is investing in family owned companies in fragmented markets and building them through acquisitions and best practices into industry leading organizations. The Firm is an active partner with management in building the value of its portfolio companies.

Through its two fund vehicles and from select co-investments, Park Avenue Equity has invested approximately $340 million since it was founded in 1999, of which approximately $50 million has come from the General Partners.

Park Avenue Equity has completed 10 platform portfolio company investments and over 50 add-on acquisitions through its two private equity funds. The Partners have broad experience in all aspects of private equity and have served on over 50 boards of directors (60% public / 40% private) with a median enterprise value of $150 million.

Our mission is to generate superior returns on our own capital and the capital of our partners through selective investments in solid operating companies with superior business models and capable management teams, coupled with appropriate leverage customized to each investment.
